course_title: Laboratory Animal Pathology and Problem-based Learning
class_notes: Location: Bourne Seminar Room, Emory Primate Center
course_description: The Comparative Pathology lectures are designed to provide a general overview of pathological lesions of laboratory animal species with emphasis on gross and histopathology. The lectures focus on classic pathologic conditions in nonhuman primates used as animal models for human diseases. In addition, residents are expected to present journal articles describing gross and histological lesions in laboratory animal species.
sections: Class Nbr: 5979, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 4-4:50p, Instructor: M. Roy, Status: Open
